DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy and safety of meloxicam 7.5mg once daily compared with diclofenac 100mg SR once daily over a treatment period of 8 weeks
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Meloxicam vs. Diclofenac SR in Patients With Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis of the knee requiring the therapy with nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
